description: Extract relative transformations, pass 1 of 2 for stabilization (see vidstabtransform for pass 2).
name: vidstabdetect

options.description: path to the file used to write the transforms (default "transforms.trf")
options.name: result

options.description: how shaky is the video and how quick is the camera? 1: little (fast) 10: very strong/quick (slow) (from 1 to 10) (default 5)
options.name: shakiness

options.description: region around minimum is scanned with 1 pixel resolution (from 1 to 32) (default 6)
options.name: stepsize

options.description: below this contrast a field is discarded (0-1) (from 0 to 1) (default 0.25)
options.name: mincontrast

options.description: 0: draw nothing; 1,2: show fields and transforms (from 0 to 2) (default 0)
options.name: show

options.description: virtual tripod mode (if >0): motion is compared to a reference reference frame (frame # is the value) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
options.name: tripod
